title: [Skin Idea] Ziggs in Wonderland
body:
Hi, mid and feed.

Sorry, wrong chat. Here it is my Ziggs splashart. Originally it had Annie and Tibbers too in the background, but i was not able to make them at their best, so i decided to erase them until a drawing skill level up. I've started drawing with photoshop some months ago, so ALL of my skills are not the best XD After the Dino Gnar skin i thought to add to mine a zip too, gloves that doesen't fit the outfit but nice "kitten shoes" just to make Jinx fantasies come true and make her face explode of happiness. 

As you can see i don't know what to write but stupid things so if you have suggestions for the background, the skin or my grammar i will appreciate that. Enjoy! XD

[](http://graceblack.altervista.org/altervista_ht/League/ZiggsIsWonderland.jpg)

replies.body: I would jump at the chance to make any champion into 1) bacon and/or 2) a kitty
please, fat pig riding bacon {{champion:113}}

Thank you, somebody is as genius as I am

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/rUNpTtAw-new-sejuani-skin-sausageuani
Ba{{champion:133}} ? not sure how it would work, but the name is right there

> I would jump at the chance to make any champion into 1) bacon and/or 2) a kitty

Why not a bacon kitty?
can it be made out of me?{{champion:107}}

O___O 

This pleases me.

> O___O 
> 
> This pleases me.

This comment pleases me moar, rawr XD
Going to hop on this train.  Yes please, the Cheshire Cat is my favorite!  KITTY....I THINK...
Well. That's terrifying.

I'm not sure about this concept. What would he throw though?

Ex: Pool Party Ziggs throws waterballoons. Wonderland Ziggs throws... what?

I've already answered to that in a previous comment, maybe i should have put it in the thread in the very first place, you're right ^^
> His w i thought could have been perfectly made with mome raths!
> [](http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120323235717/disney/images/7/7d/Momeraths.jpg)
> 
> Edit: read it as if it's in english, guys
> Edit 2: I forgot to say his Q i thought could be one of the hatters teapots and E Tweedledum and Tweedledee (choose the one you prefer XD) with a pulsing red nose.

That moment you realize you answered correctly without even having read the follow up post.

yissssss
Teacups.

Other characters in an Alice in Wonderland theme would be great.

{{champion:99}} Lux could be Alice
{{champion:69}} Cass could be the Caterpillar
{{champion:21}} Miss Fortune could be the Duchess
{{champion:134}} Syndra could be the Queen of Hearts
{{champion:64}} Lee Sin could be the King of Hearts
{{champion:4}} TF could be the Knave of Hearts
{{champion:51}} Caitlyn could be the Mad Hatter
{{champion:17}} Teemo could be the March Hare
{{champion:29}} Twitch could be the Door Mouse
{{champion:157}} Yasuo could be the Mock Turtle
{{champion:98}}  Shen could be the Gryphon
{{champion:102}} Shyvana could be the Dodo


{{champion:83}} Yorick and {{champion:36}} Mundo as Tweedle Dee and Tweedle Dumb
I love the last two! Great idea XD
annie has a wonder land skin and im pretty sure shaco does as well.

She does, but honestly... Annie doesn't fit being Alice at all.  Tibbers doesn't fit being the White Rabbit either.

Shaco has one for Mad Hatter, but he doesn't fit the Mad Hatter in my opinion (Shaco's a joker).  Also, they make it look more like the Tim Burton Mad Hatter... and I just didn't care for the Tim Burton's Alice in Wonderland.  The Mad Hatter as depicted in Are You Alice? (japanese manga) is more how I see the Mad Hatter.

Ok, so i don'actually know what to say but a huge thank you guys, i would have never expected so many comments (and GOOD, lol). I'm really happy you enjoyed but, as usual, i don't know what to say (but dumb things, of course) so just really ty XD

Uhm.. a question:
With what is this Ziggs throwing? Evil Faces or something?

His w i thought could have been perfectly made with mome raths!
[](http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120323235717/disney/images/7/7d/Momeraths.jpg)

Edit: read it as if it's in english, guys
Edit 2: I forgot to say his Q i thought could be one of the hatters teapots and E Tweedledum and Tweedledee (choose the one you prefer XD) with a pulsing red nose.
That grin fits so perfectly.

Wow, Ziggs as the Cheshire Cat, this is genius! Riot, if you chose to make this I will personally comb through both Alice in Wonderland and Alice Behind the Mirrors once more to pull out appropriate quites for you. I love those books. :)
I've been suggesting this idea for like half a year at least :p
I've just started one year ago to play lol but i have to say you have a really good taste, sir XD
Hard to look at Ziggs without making that connection.  He has that 'cheshire grin' afterall (and yes, that's what it's usually referred to as in the artistic community).
This is... so freaking creepy.
If his satchel charge isn't the Mad Hatter's hat with a fuse in it though....
With that grin he'd make a great cheshire cat. ^^
Oh lawd yes please! Ill instabuy it, even for 3250RP

It's not like if i'm living here now to wait for comments, but i do XD
Was not hoping for a thing like this btw so ty XD
well thats not creepy.
I would totally buy this, the smile fits perfectly. ;){{champion:115}}
c: i like the idea to match the annie in wonderland and mad hatter shaco ideas c: and maybe the evil queen lady will be uhm... idk someone haha a girl
I was thinking about that Vayne skin.. She seems to be like "cut their heads off!" XD
Nice! plus.... Alice in wonderland is public domain ;) ;)
